AT.name: Avenging Spirit
AT.description: Verbrecher haben dich fertiggemacht und in einen Geist verwandelt. Was noch schlimmer ist, der Mob hat deine Freundin gekidnappt und für ihre Freilassung wollen sie das Geheimnis der Geist-Energie. Um sie zu befreien und es dem Mob heimzuzahlen, musst du die Kontrolle über eine der 20 Kreaturen übernehmen und in sechs gefährlichen Leveln nach deiner Freundin suchen. Also schnapp dir einen Körper, irgendeinen Körper, stürze dich schnurstracks in die große Rettungsaktion und befreie dein Püppchen.

BG.name: Avenging Spirit
BG.description: You have been deep sixed by gangsters and turned into a ghost. To make matters worse, the mob has kidnapped your girlfriend and held her for ransom, they want the secret of ghost energy. To rescue her and get even with the mob, you must inhabit any one of 20 different creatures and search for your girlfriend on 6 dangerous levels. So grab a body, any body, make a beeline to the big rescue, and rescue your doll face.

FR.name: Avenging Spirit
FR.description: La mafia s'est débarrassée de vous, et maintenant, vous êtes un fantôme. Pire encore, elle a enlevé votre petite amie et réclame le secret de votre énergie spectrale en échange de sa libération. Pour la sauver et faire payer les gangsters, vous devrez posséder 20 créatures différentes et parcourir 6 niveaux périlleux. Possédez et foncez pour sauver votre jolie pépée !

DE.name: Avenging Spirit

ES.name: Avenging Spirit
ES.description: ¡Maldito entrometido! Una organización criminal te ha convertido en fantasma y ha secuestrado a tu novia para hacerse con el secreto de la energía espectral. ¡Es hora de rescatar a tu chica y ajustar cuentas con la mafia! Utiliza tus poderes para controlar a 20 criaturas distintas y recorre seis peligrosas fases en busca de tu amada. ¡Así que escoge un cuerpo cualquiera, lánzate de cabeza al rescate y libera a tu enamorada!

PT.name: Avenging Spirit
PT.description: Maldito intrometido! Uma organização criminosa enterrou-te e transformou-te num fantasma. Para piorar as coisas, a máfia raptou a tua companheira e como resgate pretende obter o segredo da energia espetral. Para salvares a tua namorada e ajustares contas com a máfia terás de controlar qualquer uma das 20 diferentes criaturas, bem como procurar a tua amada em seis perigosos níveis. Agarra um corpo, qualquer corpo, corta a direito para o grande resgate e salva a tua namorada.

IT.name: Avenging Spirit
IT.description: Maledizione! Sei stato eliminato dai gangster e trasformato in un fantasma. Come se non bastasse, la gang ha rapito la tua amichetta, chiedendo come riscatto la segreta energia ectoplasmica. Prendi possesso di una delle venti creature presenti e parti alla ricerca della tua ragazza, avventurandoti in sei pericolosi livelli, per salvarla e saldare i conti con quei farabutti. Impossessati di un corpo qualsiasi e lanciati in quest'ardua missione per salvare la tua dolce metà.

LV.name: Avenging Spirit
LV.description: You have been deep sixed by gangsters and turned into a ghost. To make matters worse, the mob has kidnapped your girlfriend and held her for ransom, they want the secret of ghost energy. To rescue her and get even with the mob, you must inhabit any one of 20 different creatures and search for your girlfriend on 6 dangerous levels. So grab a body, any body, make a beeline to the big rescue, and rescue your doll face.

NL.name: Avenging Spirit
NL.description: Jij vuile rat! Je bent koudgemaakt door gangsters en in een geest veranderd. Alsof dat nog niet genoeg is, hebben de maffiosi je liefje ontvoerd voor losgeld, ze willen het geheim van geestenergie. Om haar te redden en het de gangsters betaald te zetten, moet je bezit nemen van 20 verschillende wezens en op zoek gaan naar je vriendin in 6 gevaarlijke levels. Dus neem bezit van een lichaam, wat voor lichaam dan ook, kies de kortste weg naar je doel, en red je poppetje.
